channel.title: [PI] Need A Little Help :S
channel.description:
Hey, So I decided to get back into RSPS's, and I remembered how on my old Delta I had a "System Update In: (time)" command that was like this
"::update 600" (600=seconds)
So yeah, now I have moved on to PI and I was wondering if someone could help me make that? Just like the real runescape system update timer! That would be epic! :D
EDIT: Just to make sure you know, I'm talking about the Yellow timer that pops up over the pm bar when an update is soon. :o

item.title: [PI] Need A Little Help :S
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Hey,
So I decided to get back into RSPS’s, and I remembered how on my old Delta I had a “System Update In: (time)” command that was like this

“::update 600” (600=seconds)

So yeah, now I have moved on to PI and I was wondering if someone could help me make that?
Just like the real runescape system update timer! That would be epic!

EDIT: Just to make sure you know, I’m talking about the Yellow timer that pops up over the pm bar when an update is soon. :o

Read full topic
